com.estimote.sdk.connection

Interface BeaconOta.Callback

  • Enclosing class:
    BeaconOta

    public static interface BeaconOta.Callback
    Callback to indicate status of beacon's update.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFailure(EstimoteException e)
      An error occurred during beacon's update.
      void onProgress(float progress, String message)
      Progress notification of the update.
      void onSuccess()
      Invoked when beacon has been updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        Invoked when beacon has been updated.

      • onProgress

        void onProgress(float progress,
              String message)
        Progress notification of the update.
        Parameters:
        progress - Progress of the update. Range: 0..1, where 0 represents 0% and 1 represents 100%.
        message - Human readable status of beacon's update procedure.

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(EstimoteException e)
        An error occurred during beacon's update.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception that happened.
